knimeNode.name: Refresh Button Widget
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a button widget with configurable text which emits reactivity events in component visualizations.

intro.p: Creates a button widget with configurable text which emits reactivity events in component visualizations. These events trigger partial re-execution within a component of downstream nodes, allowing users to leverage the power of the KNIME Reactive Visualization framework and create interactive web applications and visualizations in real- time.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown above the button.
Native browser tooltip text to be shown for the button.

knimeNode.interactiveView: Displays a button with text and an optional label which emits reactivity events to re-execute downstream nodes.

ports.outPort: Variable output port to connect to nodes which should be re-executed when the widget is clicked. Nodes downstream of a node connected to this flow variable output port will also be re-executed, so it's only necessary to connect to the root node in each workflow branch for which re-execution is desired. The flow variable value is trivial and does not contain any information.
